name: Nightdriving
description:
Nightdriving
Level Design Adam Grosse
Programming by Taylor Morris
3D Art by Valerio Terreri
Music by Samson Li (2, 3, 4) and Simon Cho (1)

Created for Vancouver Global Game Jam 2014

======= Controls =======

"A" & "D" - Turn
"W" - Accelerate
"S" - Reverse

"R" - Restart

"Left Shift" - Speed Boost
"Space" - Hand Brake

Music
"1" - Track 1 /// "2" - Track 2 /// "3" - Track 3 /// "4" - Track 4

Camera
"U" - Outside /// "I" - Bumper /// "O" - Wheel /// "P" - Hood

Headlamps
"K" - Headlamps off /// "L" - Headlamps on

Time Speed
"Z" - Slow Motion /// "X" - Fast Motion

======= =======
